name: Wolf

aspects.high_concept: Cunning Pack Predator of Skyrim's Wilds

stunts: Pack Tactics: +1 to Fight for each allied wolf in the same zone (max +3)
Bring Down Prey: When successfully attacking with Fight against a target with physical stress, may create aspect 'Hamstrung' with one free invoke
Keen Nose: +2 to Notice when tracking by scent
notes: Wolves are common predators throughout Skyrim. They hunt in packs and use coordinated tactics to bring down prey. They avoid obviously stronger opponents and flee when the pack is reduced.
combat_tactics: Wolves attack in coordinated packs, surrounding targets and attacking from multiple angles. They target the weakest-looking member of a group. If more than half the pack is defeated, survivors flee.
